name: barede
description:
barede is a program made to help people learn symbols by splitting them up into smaller parts. as of now, it contains all digits (0-9) and letters (a-z) in english, as well as voice lines that play after each symbol is completed.

trace the highlighted lines individually, then the shape will come together, and then trace the entire shape!

changelog

v 0.1- added trace allowance; can be a little bit off, and it will still work!

v 0.2- added settings menu, with trace tolerance setting (see v0.1) and volume slider.

v 0.3- added all numbers, 0 through 9. Only 2, 5, & 9 have voice lines.

v 0.3.1- added voice lines to all numbers, small changes to 4 and 8

v 0.4- added a through e + overhaul to start menu

v 0.5 - added rest of alphabet (f to z) without voice lines

v 1.0 - all voice lines completed + color scheme changed

v 1.1 - ui scaling + menu overhaul! no more weird dimensions for the menu
